sentence: But to your question, yes, when people like Boebert (R-CO) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) sit in the well of the house under the banner of GOP and espouse very kind of evil ideas about QAnon, making ugly comparisons to the Holocaust and just literally, we’re just in a moment where that silence, a conspiracy of silence has allowed conspiracy-minded people to affect the public conversation.
